I found that the uncracked, unpatched steam version works fine with a steam emulator
Now im playing single player perfect not one crash.

1. Obtain uncracked, unpatched steam version (I had a friend let me download a unpatched, uncracked version to my pc).
2. installed PacSteam( steam emulator)
3. Made bogus account thru Pacsteam
4. placed whole game inside this directory 
C:\PacSteamT\SteamApps\common\left 4 dead 2

5. add non-steam game; point to the left4dead2.exe

If you download this copy for god sake DON'T patch it or use the crack. JUST USE A STEAM EMULATOR.

Ok, for all the ones having the game crash right after the intro movie... I had the same problem and found out how to correct it just this morning.  Playing the game since without any problem.

The game seems to connect to some distant server and realizes that it is a cracked version, reason why it stops working right after the intro.  To make it work, just go to the firewall and prevent the exe from using any network... Thought this razor release wasn't working but it wasn't the case...

Hope it helps some of you!

* Changed rules for ghost placement in Scavenge Mode
* Player controlled Special Infected are no longer forced to un-crouch and lock strafe when they crouch attack

* Fixed the helping hand from getting stuck when extended

I could not get the game to start as it would error out

application error

I've since learned that I needed to set "Data Execution Prevention"

control panel | system | advanced | performance (TAB)

here you select 'Turn on DEP for all programs and services except those I select:'

click on add and navigate to the left4dead.exe

i havent even downloaded it yet and i know your an idiot... try reading the readme or even the little blurb at the top of the page... its tells you exactly what to do! here's a hint.... its step 3

HOW TO PLAY THIS RELEASE ON LAN

1. Install game + fixed crack release from Razor1911

2. Make a shortcut to the left4dead2.exe -> Right click -> Properties -> add "-console" to the end of shortcut target, ex: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Left 4 Dead 2\left4dead2.exe" -console

3. Open game

4. Write: bind "f12" "toggleconsole" in the console. You can now open the console ingame with f12

5. Write in console:

sv_lan 0

z_difficulty x ( example = z_difficulty Hard )

map x ( x = the name of the map )

After doing this , your friends can see the server in the menu and join it.

(Map names

Dead Center

      map c1m1_hotel
      map c1m2_streets
      map c1m3_mall
      map c1m4_atrium 

Dark Carnival

      map c2m1_highway
      map c2m2_fairgrounds
      map c2m3_coaster
      map c2m4_barns
      map c2m5_concert 

Swamp Fever

      map c3m1_plankcountry
      map c3m2_swamp
      map c3m3_shantytown
      map c3m4_plantation 

Hard Rain

      map c4m1_milltown_a
      map c4m2_sugarmill_a
      map c4m3_sugarmill_b (Mill Escape level)
      map c4m4_milltown_b (Return To Town level)
      map c4m5_milltown_escape 

The Parish

      map c5m1_waterfront
      map c5m2_park
      map c5m3_cemetery
      map c5m4_quarter
      map c5m5_bridge)
